title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Practitioner English Training Utilizing AI-Supported Digital Visual Content

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English proficiency and understanding of basic mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners create at least three types of infographics explaining mathematical concepts using AI tools
Learners accurately use over 50 English terminology related to mathematics through digital poster presentations
Learners critically analyze AI-generated content and apply it at least twice to digital video projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
